message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Let's be fair.  I'll take 90% now, and you can have the remaining 10%.  It's a much better deal than what you offered me.
Okay, Bob, I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but I'm still holding most of the value. Let's get this done.
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's split it 60/40.  It's a fair deal that benefits us both, and we can finally end this game.
